title: Separating Terms
text: Separate the terms so that it forms multiple fractions with the same denominator. It will result in the following: $$\frac{63m^4}{negneg}\left(7m^2\right)}-\frac{42m^3}{\operatorname{\left(-7m^2\right)}$$.

title: Simplify Terms
text: What is the result once each fraction term is simplified?
